lead_paragraph: The Grand Slam of Golf, which brings together the winners of the season’s four majors, will return to the United States mainland for the first time in more than two decades in October.

headline.main: New Home for Grand Slam of Golf

snippet: The Grand Slam of Golf, which brings together the winners of the season’s four majors, will return to the United States mainland for the first time in more than two decades in October.
